page.title: 10HEALTH : SWANSEA WEST
page.content: There is a doctors' surgery in Killay, at which are 9 doctors who alternate between this and the Sketty surgery. There are 2 nurses and 7 other qualified staff attached to these surgeries. Killay surgery serves approx. 8500 patients and Sketty surgery approx. 9000. Each doctor treats approx. 60 people each day. There are 17 dentists in practice in our area. Killay dental surgery has about 1600 patients and the two dentists there see about 50 patients each, per day. Singleton Hospital is the district general hospital serving our area. Its casualty department has recently been threatened with closure. Cefn Coed Hospital looks after people with social/psychiatric problems.
